SELECT r.*, t.topic_name, s.stu_name, te.tname FROM tb_result r LEFT JOIN tb_topic t ON r.topic_id = t.topic_id LEFT JOIN tb_student s ON r.stu_id = s.stu_id LEFT JOIN tb_teacher te ON r.tid = te.tid WHERE r.approval_status = 3
AND CONCAT(`result_name`, `topic_name`,`stu_name`,`tname`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
ORDER BY r.createtime

SELECT r.*, t.topic_name, s.stu_name, s.science, te.tname FROM tb_result r LEFT JOIN tb_topic t ON r.topic_id = t.topic_id LEFT JOIN tb_student s ON r.stu_id = s.stu_id LEFT JOIN tb_teacher te ON r.tid = te.tid WHERE r.approval_status = 3 AND CONCAT(s.edudate) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{enrollmentYear},'%') AND r.final_score >= 90
AND CONCAT(`result_name`, `topic_name`,`stu_name`,`tname`) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
ORDER BY r.createtime
SELECT r.final_score FROM tb_result r LEFT JOIN tb_student s ON s.stu_id = r.stu_id WHERE CONCAT(s.edudate) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{enrollmentYear},'%') AND r.final_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.final_score
